bibl.title: The Greek Apocalypse of Peter.
bibl.note: Discusses the Greek fragments of the Apocalypse of Peter from Egypt from a palaeographical, codicological, and philological point of view. - Pp. 34-39: Appendix: The Bodleian and Rainer Fragments [P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.theol. f. 4 (P) (= van Haelst 620) + P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 39756 (= van Haelst 619)].
VAN MINNEN Peter, The Greek Apocalypse of Peter.
Jan N. BREMMER and Istv√°n CZACHESZ (Edd.), The Apocalypse of Peter = Studies on Early Christian Apocrypha. 7 (Leuven, 2003) pp. 15-39, 2 figg.
